Name: AllergyIntoleranceCategory
Title: AllergyIntoleranceCategory
Descriptino: Category of an identified substance associated with allergies or intolerances.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceCriticality
Title: AllergyIntoleranceCriticality
Descriptino: Estimate of the potential clinical harm, or seriousness, of a reaction to an identified substance.

Name: CarePlanActivityKind
Title: Care Plan Activity Kind
Descriptino: Resource types defined as part of FHIR that can be represented as in-line definitions of a care plan activity.

Name: CarePlanActivityStatus
Title: CarePlanActivityStatus
Descriptino: Codes that reflect the current state of a care plan activity within its overall life cycle.

Name: CarePlanIntent
Title: Care Plan Intent
Descriptino: Codes indicating the degree of authority/intentionality associated with a care plan.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceSeverity
Title: AllergyIntoleranceSeverity
Descriptino: Clinical assessment of the severity of a reaction event as a whole, potentially considering multiple different manifestations.

Name: EpisodeOfCareStatusSubset
Title: Subset of Episode Of Care Status
Descriptino: A subset of allowed statuses for EpisodeOfCare.
